title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally; supports Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and more.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client and CLI for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings and tool-calling inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now “Open WebUI”); offers chat history, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper that turns Ollama into your shell copilot; suggests commands and explains stderr in plain English.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that adds inline code completion powered by any Ollama model; behaves like GitHub Copilot offline.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarizing notes, brainstorming and translating inside your vault.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, async calls, and Spring Boot starter; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, completion, embeddings, and model management; includes a Blazor demo.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC, and autoscaler support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama, Open WebUI, Weaviate, qDrant, or Postgres for quick local RAG setups.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Python-based Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model; supports group threads, system prompts and streaming replies.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Go bot bringing Ollama models to Discord slash commands; streams responses as Discord messages.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio; exposes chat, generate, pull, and list operations with strong typing.

title: ollama-gpt-researcher
summary: Fork of GPT-Researcher that replaces OpenAI with Ollama for fully local autonomous research reports.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions for Llama 3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc.; community PRs welcome.

title: reddit/r/ollama – Weekly discussion thread
summary: Active community sharing new models, UI screenshots, performance tips, and GPU compatibility reports.
